definition: tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
surname Mi/name of an ancient state
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: Shen Yinmo is closely related to the revival of modern Chinese calligraphic culture.
sentences.chinese: 沈尹默與現代中國書法文化復興是緊密相聯的。

sentences.english: And that Citizen's diatheses improve is tie to Education.
sentences.chinese: 而國民素質的提高是和教育緊密相聯的。

sentences.english: In the future, I want to connect my life closely to environmental protection.
sentences.chinese: 將來，我想讓我的生活和環境保護緊密相聯。

sentences.english: Investment risk and return areinextricably linked.
sentences.chinese: 投資風險與投資回報緊密相聯。

sentences.english: Subcellular location of apoptosis proteins is closely related to their function.
sentences.chinese: 細胞凋亡蛋白的亞細胞位置與它的功能緊密相聯。

sentences.english: Nietzsche's view of history is tightly connected to the Lebensphilosophie.
sentences.chinese: 尼采的歷史觀是和生命哲學緊密相聯的。

sentences.english: The development of travels literary works is closely related with the process of the humanized natural .
sentences.chinese: 遊觀文學的勃興與自然的“人性化”過程緊密相聯。

sentences.english: As a military badge logo design, it'susually closely linked with the flag.
sentences.chinese: 軍徽作爲軍隊的標誌圖案，通常與軍旗緊密相聯。

sentences.english: Your future is bound up with the fate of your motherland.
sentences.chinese: 你的前途同祖國的命運緊密相聯。
